Reviews.Title: A must have for Lytro Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Nixon
Reviews.Content: Tried three different miscellaneous USB chargers, all of which failed to charge the camera.  Charging  camera though computer is very slow (nearly 6 hours for initial charge).  I did not get charging through a USB hub to work either, so camera must be connected straight to computer to get the power it needs.  So this charger is a must.

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: PeterB10021
Reviews.Content: The charger is a useful item but it is expensive in light of its very ordinary appearance and lack of additional featurss.  While countless generic versions of the micro-usb charger can be found, for all of the purists and collectors, the Lytro version will be the one to have.

Reviews.Title: Lytro charger
Reviews.Author: Charles W Schaffer
Reviews.Content: Although not strictly needed since you can charge via the usb, it's convenient and is in my view good value for money.

Reviews.Title: fast charging charger by lytro
Reviews.Author: Donna Manning
Reviews.Content: Does the job, decent price, looks sturdy, portable, fast charging charger by lytro.  I'd recommend this charger to anyone with a Lytro.

Reviews.Title: Mistake.
Reviews.Author: Edwin J. Deighton
Reviews.Content: My cell phone charger works just fine, so did not need buy another. Would be nice if it was pointed out in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Fast Charger!
Reviews.Author: A. Pulido
Reviews.Content: Serves multiple uses besides just Lytro.  I've used it on my Kindle and Kindle Fire and works great for both!
